channel.title: Youtube working for you at normal speed with sound in Whonix 13 / 14?

item.title: Youtube working for you at normal speed with sound in Whonix 13 / 14?
item.dc:creator: unman
item.description:
Is youtube and sound working for you at normal speed with sound in Whonix 13 / 14?

Related:

Testers wanted! Upgrade Qubes-Whonix 13 -> Qubes-Whonix 14

https://phabricator.whonix.org/T780

https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/3685

This might be just a localized issue with my computer and not a general Qubes-Whonix issue.

Working fine for me in both 13 and 14.
